short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the zimplicit Chrome Extension. It is an extension that allows you to use the zimplicit API to get your zimplic data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zimplicit empowers seamless communication and engagement between you and your employees through its intuitive companion, SAM. Whether it's daily operations or navigating through organizational changes, Zimplicit serves as your one-stop hub for delivering crucial information directly to your team.
With Zimplicit, you can effortlessly provide your employees with the relevant resources they need, including clear instructions, insightful exercises, and task clarifications. SAM ensures that your team stays informed about their responsibilities and equipped with the necessary tools to excel in their roles.
